posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy or trade for T210 red borders. I am not looking for any Series 2 cards however, and only a handful of Series 3 cards still. But for all the other Series, I could be interested in just about anything you might have. 

I am open to buy and I also have about 30 duplicates, mostly Series 2 but a handful in the other Series to offer up in potential trades. 

Lets see if we can make a deal.

[quote name="wazoo" post=2282693]Do you need Dale Series 3?[/QUOTE]
I did see your posting for the Dale, but I do not need Dale. Appreciate you checking though.

Always a place for Gunderson;
in most folk's collections.
He's a toughie; a total of 10 out there (SGC and PSA combined).

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1364&pictureid=34789[/IMG]

Ben
